title: Lunar Wrath Caitlyn
body:
Does anyone know if/when this skin will return and how much will it cost so I can set aside RP! Thanks! :D

Edit: Changed IP to RP, thanks for point out!

replies.body:
A) if they bring it back, it'll be Lunar Revel next year (around February I think? Chinese New Year).
B) Skins don't cost IP, they cost RP and this one was a 1350 RP skin. I know because I currently have it sitting in my Hextech Crafting (I don't own Caitlyn but she's who I'm gonna buy probably next), and it's listed as an Epic skin and Epic skins are 1350.

Yup, yup, this is correct! 

She also has the potential to come back at a random time through the year as well!
